name: monetdb
description: Connect MonetDB to your NodeJS app

scripts.coverage: `npm bin`/istanbul cover `npm bin`/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec Tests/test.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run-script coverage && node node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js < coverage/lcov.info
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md index.js > README.md && jsdoc2md mapi-connection.js > README.mapi-connection.md
